query:
{
				paymentSettings(where: {paymentMethod: DirectACH}) {
					
    id
    paymentMethod
    processorCustomerId
    processorSourceId
    customerEmail
    creditCardBrand
    paymentAccountLast4
    creditCardExpMonth
    creditCardExpYear
    creditCardStatus
    customerName
    customerType
    achVerifyStatus
    businessId

				}
			}
